backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, leads, outreach, deals, services, projects, and client service requests with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report mapping features to affected frontend files and components with confidence and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps main pages in AppShell without authentication gating.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOnlyS: Wrapper component that restricts content to admins and shows an access-denied alert otherwise.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClientServ: Admin panel displaying client service requests for an agency using tables and service lookup.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal component for collecting and pre-filling user profile data, handling admin allowlist logic and submitting registration.
frontend/src/components/common/ChartBloc: Simple card wrapper that displays a chart with a header, title, and optional action element.
Clickable card showing lead details, status badge, and basic metadata like city and revenue potential.
frontend/src/components/common/ProgressB: Displays a labeled progress bar with optional percentage or numeric values.
frontend/src/components/common/StatsCard: Card component showing a statistic value with optional icon, subtitle, and trend indicator.
frontend/src/components/export/ExportDat: UI section enabling exporting user data to PDF, DOCX/RTF, CSV, or Excel, with loading states and download handling.
Main application layout providing sidebar navigation, mobile menu handling, and content container.
frontend/src/components/nav/FollowUpBadg: Popover badge showing the count of leads due for follow-up, currently using placeholder logic.
frontend/src/components/nav/SidebarNav.t: Sidebar navigation listing main app routes, handling admin checks and session clearing.
frontend/src/constants/uploadedImages.ts: Centralized mapping of uploaded image asset paths with URL-encoded filenames.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, handling admin token initialization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgencyAnalytics.ts: Provides a query hook that fetches analytics data (leads, deals, outreach, services, projects) for the caller's agency using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthRole.ts: Defines hooks to fetch the caller's user role and admin status, handling guest users gracefully.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientServiceReque: Implements hooks to create and fetch client service requests, with cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to get, save, and register the caller's user profile, managing auth errors and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeals.ts: Adds hooks for fetching user deals by agency and updating deal status with related query invalidations.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportData.ts: Fetches export-ready data for leads, outreach, services, deals, and projects via parallel actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing identity state, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeads.ts: Contains hooks for retrieving, adding, importing, and updating lead status with analytics-aware invalidations.
frontend/src/hooks/useOutreach.ts: Provides hooks to list outreach activities and add new ones, updating related caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useServices.ts: Supplies hooks to fetch services and mutate service creation or status, refreshing service-related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining themes, utilities, and layout/typography helpers for the frontend.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Displays agency analytics with bar charts for revenue by service and niche plus summary cards for top metrics.
Allows clients to select a service, review details, and submit onboarding requests tied to their principal identity.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows an overview of agency performance including outreach metrics, funnel counts, revenue stats, and visual charts.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPage.tsx: Lists user deals grouped by status with counts and total values, showing individual deal cards per column.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Manages leads with search, niche/status filters, CSV import, and a grid of lead cards.
frontend/src/pages/OutreachPage.tsx: Tracks outreach activities by platform with tabs, counts, and detailed lists or placeholders when empty.
frontend/src/pages/PlannerPage.tsx: Renders a 30‑day outreach planner page with a main CTA card and feature cards using uploaded images and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Displays a projects list page with a header, new project button, and an empty‑state message.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalSharePage.tsx: Shows a proposal viewer placeholder using a proposalId from the route.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays services with status, pricing, stats, and edit options, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings, profile info, API config, and admin-only sections based on role checks.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Implements optional sign‑in via Internet Identity with optional identifier input and loading feedback.
frontend/src/types/docx.d.ts: Type definitions for the docx module, including document, table, paragraph, and formatting classes.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Type definitions for jspdf-autotable, specifying table cell, style, and configuration interfaces.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Type definitions for jsPDF, covering constructor options, text and page APIs, and output methods.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Type definitions for xlsx, including workbook and worksheet structures and utility functions.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Defines hardcoded admin details and utilities to match identifiers and return prefill data.
frontend/src/utils/export/download.ts: Creates a temporary link to download a Blob and cleans up the object URL.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportCsv.ts: Generates CSV text for multiple data sections using defined field schemas and value extraction.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportDocx.ts: Builds a simple RTF document representing exported data and wraps it in a Blob.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportPdf.ts: Produces an HTML document styled for printing to PDF, including tables for each data type.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportSchema.t: Defines field schemas and formatting rules for leads, outreach, services, deals, and projects, plus a helper to extract values.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportXlsx.ts: Generates a minimal SpreadsheetML XML file representing exported data and returns it as an ArrayBuffer.
frontend/src/utils/export/filename.ts: Creates export filenames with timestamps and formats the current date-time as a readable string.
frontend/src/utils/signInIdentifier.ts: Stores and retrieves sign‑in identifiers, classifies them as email or phone, and compares them safely.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, architecture notes, authentication changes, and existing features for a Bubble app. Captures multi-tenant rules, data model, UI components, OpenAI integration, and pending OTP setup issues.
